attributes.action: Reform the terms of address in the House of Commons
attributes.additional_details:
To reform the terms of address that members of the House of Commons refer to each other.
Ruling out the use of Honourable, Right Honourable, and Right Honourable and Learned Friend/ Gentleman/ Lady.
To replace with the name/ constituancy/ job description with suggestion that instead of Friend the actual name of the Member and Gentleman, the Constituancy.
